description:
The ultimate tube patch. It flexes, stretches, twists, is self adhesive. No need to carry messy glue or bulky packaging. Roughen up the tube with the sandpaper, clean, patch and go. (You should also inflate the tube at some point after putting the patch on.)

  • Includes 6 patches with sandpaper in a sweet little case
name: Park Tool GP-2 Glueless Patches
